questions.question: Isolate the Emergency registration source to see how many of its patients receive a Blood Panel diagnostic test.

answer.value: 120 patients from the Emergency registration source receive a Blood Panel diagnostic test.

key_insights: After isolating Emergency, we see it sends ~210 patients to Internal Medicine, its most common department destination.
A majority of Emergency patients who get a Blood Panel proceed to Medication treatment

reasoning.reasoning: The trace node action eliminates overlapping flows, making the Emergency pathway visible
The get data tool then extracts the precise patient count for the Blood Panel step, which was hidden in the original view.
